message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.CV 

This paper proposes a method to enhance the source sentence representation for neural machine translation (NMT) using explicit sentence compression. The paper focuses on improving the performance of NMT, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The proposed method involves learning the backbone information in a sentence, which can be achieved using machine learning techniques such as artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and deep learning (cs.LG). The paper also mentions the use of fusion techniques to integrate the compressed sentence into NMT, which can be related to neural networks (cs.NE) and computer vision (cs.CV) sub-categories.
